definitions.definition: An elastic material is able to stretch and be returned to its original shape or size:
examples: A lot of sportswear is made of very elastic material.

definitions.definition: able or likely to be changed:
examples: The project has only just started so any plans are still very elastic.

definitions.definition: a type of rubber that is able to stretch and be returned to its original shape or size:
examples: His trousers were held up with a piece of elastic.
